Details

By uploading any document, all the pages related to that document will have to be re-uploaded.

After reporting any service, you will have to upload the necessary documents to you.

  • All files should be in PDF format. (.pdf extension)
  • Maximum file size (for each) should be 1 MB.
Document upload fee

  • Active Contractor Fee :500
  • Idle Contractor Fee : 2000
Security deposit

  • The security amount is different for each service.
  • Please note that the security amount charged at the time of registration process is different from the security amount charged at the time of contract.
